options.content:
Globus Task Data by Science Discipline

This dashboard shows information related to science disciplines for top talkers using the NetSage Science Registry.
The map shows only the top 100 pairs of organizations with at least one end tagged in the science registry. Larger dots indicate larger tasks.
The Sankey graph shows the top ten source organizations by volume for the selected discipline(s) and organization(s)
and their associated top three destination organizations, with thicker lines for larger task volumes.
Globus Tasks have been de-identified and confidential data has been removed.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline OR meta.scireg.dst.discipline:$discipline) AND (meta.src_org_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

panels.title: Task Volume for Selected Science Disciplines and Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors && (meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline OR meta.scireg.dst.discipline:$discipline) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org)

panels.title: Total Task Volume for Selected Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org)

panels.title: Total Task Volume for Selected Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org)

panels.title: Total Number of Tasks for Selected Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org)AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline

panels.title: Total Task Volume by Source of Selected Disciplines

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors && (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org)AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.scireg.dst.discipline:$discipline

panels.title: Total Task Volume by Destination of Selected Disciplines

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors && meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline && (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND (meta.src_organization:(-UNAVAILABLE) AND meta.dst_organization:(-UNAVAILABLE)) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

options.content:
Summary of All Disciplines

Only tasks where source or destination has been tagged with a science discipline
from the Science Registry are counted.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org)
meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org)

list.definition: {"find":"terms", "field":"meta.scireg.src.discipline", "query":"-meta.scireg.src.discipline:\"CS.Network Testing and Monitoring\" AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org)"}
list.label: Discipline
list.name: discipline
list.query: {"find":"terms", "field":"meta.scireg.src.discipline", "query":"-meta.scireg.src.discipline:\"CS.Network Testing and Monitoring\" AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org)"}

title: What are the Globus tasks by science discipline?
